release.description: As part of our continued commitment to ensure our infrastructure reliability and redundancy, we will be performing maintenance in our Production environment. During this maintenance users may experience intermittent connectivity interruptions with existing sessions. The ability to attach and view documents may also be affected. All jobs will be held in queue until the maintenance has been completed. Maintaining uptime and availability is of the utmost importance to BlackLine and we strive to provide as much notice as possible. From time to time it may be necessary to perform urgent maintenance to continue to provide the availability and uptime our customers expect. We appreciate your patience and understanding during this maintenance. Times are subject to change, but will be updated before and after maintenance.

release.description: BlackLine will enforce universal use of SFTP (Secure File Transfer Protocol) on October 20, 2018. Other file transfer encryption solutions will be disabled at that time. This improvement to BlackLine's data ingestion process is part of BlackLine's continued effort to provide increased protection to our customers and their data. Please note: PGP use is unchanged and will still be available to customers as always. Please contact BlackLine Support with questions at any time during this transition.

release.description: BlackLine will be performing infrastructure maintenance in our US2 Sandbox environment on Friday, July 20th 3:00 PM - 4:00 PM PT (10:00 PM - 11:00 PM UTC). Jobs submitted at the start of the maintenance window will be held in queue until the the maintenance window has been completed.
